question: Identify the technology adoption trends among companies in the healthcare sector.

subtasks.task: Gather a list of companies operating in the healthcare sector and their basic details such as revenue and employee count.
Collect data on the technology stack used by the identified healthcare companies to understand what technologies they have adopted.
Analyze partnership details of healthcare companies to see how they collaborate with technology vendors.
Look into industry-specific IT trends to correlate them with the data gathered on technology adoption in the healthcare sector.
